title: Black Screen of Death .. ugh. What a POS!
content:
352930102911262 is the IMEI on my Pixel 4xl.  Alwazs been in a case.   Can feel it heat up but holding down any and all buttons do not work.

Tried every thing. Diff chargers that work fine on this Pixel 4xl. BLACK SCREEN OF DEATH, sometimes makes random sounds.
